name: Finterior Decorator
description:
Finterior Decorator is a game about filling up an aquarium with all the wonderful decorations and plants that keeps your fishy friends swimming and smiling! Be sure to keep these lil guys happy and healthy as you add to the aquarium.

  • Ørjan Lopez - Programmer & Tech Art
  • Megan McCurdy - Concept Art & 3D Art
  • Maemi No Yume - Music & Sound
  • Kytana Le - UI Design
  • Courtney Millman - 3D Art
